nodes.text: The Droid motion sensors Type 1 were devices that enabled a droid to better detect organics hidden by stealth fields. This basic model was the most inexpensive version and was commonly available on many worlds. It was installed in the wreckage of a Rakatan guardian droid in the Rakatan ruins on Dantooine.
A droid must be at upgrade class 1 to be able to equip this item.
